divs: sighting detailson 11\28\2012 the moon is full and bright with some stars visable. at approximatly 1945 pm i witnessed 2 fast moving aircraft flying east. i was stairing at the moon at the time the aircraft went by. that night i noticed 2 bright stars. one large at the 11 o'clock position and other at the 4 o'clock around the moon. i brought out my telecope to get a closer look. the large object at 11:00 position what i could see was round, white an blue with a hole in the middle rotating clockwise. the other at 4:00 was just very bright white. i stayed out to observe for 1 hr an 15 mimutes i would have stayed longer but the temp outside was around 28 and falling. on the following night 11\29\2012 at 2000 hrs or 8 pm i observed the moon again but the objects are now gone. i'm sure there were others that had to see this. i wrote in to see if i could get some feed back on this event.
Summary: Round object white an blue with hole in center turning clock wise
